member_organisations:
34 regional Chambers (KADIN Daerah) and 514 district branches. 
 
http://www.kadin-indonesia.or.id/anggota/anggota
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, International co-operation and development, Customs, Environment, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, External Relations, Food Safety
head_office_address: Menara KADIN Indonesia, 24th Floor Jl. H. R. Rasuna Said X-5 Kav. 2-3
eu_initiatives: Comprehensive Economic Partnership Agreement between EU-Indonesia, EU-ASEAN, FLEGT, EU Pesticides Regulation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
KADIN stands for ‘Kamar Dagang dan Industri‘, or Chamber of Commerce and Industry. It is the umbrella organization of the Indonesian business chambers and associations. 
 
KADIN is focused on all matters relating to trade, industry and services, and is highly committed to tapping potentials and synergies of the national economy, offering a strategic forum for Indonesian entrepreneurs. It is privately financed, hence an independent spokesperson of private sector interests. 
 
It is also the only nation-wide business organization mandated by Law No. 1/1987 to speak on behalf of private business.
